name: Fairy Tail – Matchlille
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a Spellcaster monster with 1850 original ATK is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Spellcaster monsters.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Fairy Tail" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
③：You can pay 500 LP; the name of 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls becomes "Fairy Prince".

name: Weaver of Fairy Tail Tales
desc:
1 "Fairy Tail" monster + 1 Spellcaster monster
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Fairy Tail" monster from your Deck or banishment.
②：If you Normal or Special Summon a non-EARTH "Fairy Tail" monster(s) while this monster is on the field: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, also its name becomes "Fairy Prince".
③：Any "Fairy Prince" on the field becomes a Spellcaster monster.

name: Chronicler of Fairy Tail Tales
desc:
1 LIGHT "Fairy Tail" monster + 1 Spellcaster monster
You can only use the ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Fusion Summoned using "Fairy Prince" as material: You can destroy as many cards your opponent controls as possible, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to them for each.
②：Your "Fairy Tail" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle.
③：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Fairy Tail" card from your hand or GY, except "Fairy Tail Tales"; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

name: Fairy Tail – Wickat
desc:
2 Level 4 Spellcaster monsters
You can only use the ② and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①："Fairy Tail" monsters you control whose original Attribute is LIGHT are unaffected by your opponent's activated effects.
②：You can detach up to 2 materials from this card; send that many "Fairy Tail" cards from your Deck to the GY, except "Fairy Tail Tales".
③：If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Fairy Tail" monster you control whose original Attribute is LIGHT; Special Summon this card, and if you do, send that monster to the GY.

name: Fairy Tail Long Long Ago
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Special Summon up to 1 LIGHT "Fairy Tail" monster with different names each from your hand, GY, and/or banishment, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Spellcaster monsters.
②：If this card is sent to the GY, except from the field, or becomes banished: You can Set it, but it cannot be activated unless you control a "Fairy Tail" monster.

name: Fairy Tail Ball
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can add 1 "Fairy Tail" monster or "Fairy Tail Tales" from your Deck or banishment to your hand.
②：Your "Fairy Tail" monsters can attack directly.
③：Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) and you control a "Fairy Tail" monster: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, also its name becomes "Fairy Prince".

name: Tales of Fairy Tail
desc:
You can only use the ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK.
②：Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 Spellcaster Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field. You can also use any "Fairy Prince" your opponent controls.
③：If this card is in the GY: You can equip it to a "Fairy Tail" monster on the field, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Spellcaster monster with 1850 ATK.

name: Heavy Knight Babel Decker
desc:
You can only use the ② and ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH Machine monster from your hand.
③：If your opponent activated a card or effect this turn: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 10 EARTH Machine monster from your Extra Deck using this card you control as material (this is treated as an Xyz Summon).

name: Noctilucent Train Bleu Traveler
desc:
You can use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn. You can use the ② effect of this card's name once per Duel.
①：You can discard this card; add 1 "Train Connection" or "Revolving Switchyard" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 other EARTH Machine monster in your GY; Special Summon it and this card, also your cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters.

name: Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Gustav Rocket
desc:
3 Level 10 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Gustav Rocket" by discarding 1 card and using "Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Gustav Max" you control (transfer its materials to this card). You can use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When your opponent activates a monster effect and this card has material (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that monster, then inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
②：Once per turn, during your End Phase: Detach 1 material from this card or destroy it.

name: Superdreadnought Rail Cannon Flying Launcher
desc:
2 Level 10 monsters
You can use the ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 EARTH Machine monster or "Barrage Blast" from your Deck to your hand.
②：During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Machine monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (you can only gain this effect once per turn).
③：You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them.

name: Exceptional Schedule
desc:
You can use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Add 1 "Special Schedule" or "Urgent Schedule" from your Deck to your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 "Schedule Token" (Machine/EARTH/Level 10/ATK 3000/DEF 3000) to your opponent's field.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Level 10 Machine monster in your GY or banishment; send 1 card you control to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon that monster.

name: Verre, the Maid of Endymion
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Witchcrafter" card. You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase, if a Spell Card or effect was activated this turn: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Witchcrafter" Spell/Trap or "Magical Dimension" from your Deck to your hand.
③：Gains 2300 ATK while you have "Regulus, the Prince of Endymion" in your field or GY.

name: Lev Shaddoll Fusion
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn. You cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck the turn you activate either of this card's effects, except "Shaddoll" monsters.
①：When this card resolves, send 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY.
②：You can Tribute 1 Fusion Monster; Special Summon 1 "Shaddoll" Fusion Monster with a different Attribute from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Fusion Summon), and if you do, change its ATK to 0.

name: Masked HERO Fountain
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card from your hand; Special Summon 1 "HERO" monster from your hand in Defense Position.
②：If this card is sent to the GY to activate a card effect, or by card effect: You can Set 1 "Mask Change" from your Deck or GY.

name: Poisonous Viper
desc:
You can only use the ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon it, or, if your opponent controls no monsters, Special Summon it to their field in Defense Position instead.
②：Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You take 500 damage.
③：If this card is sent to the GY by card effect or banished: You can target 1 opponent's Set Spell/Trap; destroy it. It cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation.

name: Fallen Angel in Darkness
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Darklord" card. You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Send 1 Fairy monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Darklord" monster from your hand, Deck, or banishment, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

name: Junk Armor
desc:
You can only use the ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can Special Summon it.
②：Your opponent cannot target Synchro Monsters you control with "Warrior" and/or "Stardust" in their original names with card effects.
③：You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Junk" or "Synchron" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Junk Armor".

name: Junk Meister
desc:
You can only use the ① ② and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal 1 "Warrior" or "Stardust" Synchro Monster in your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Junk" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Junk Meister".
③：You can target 1 "Junk" monster you control; decrease its Level by up to 2.

name: Over Tuning
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：If you control a Tuner: Special Summon 1 Tuner from your hand, Deck, or GY, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except Synchro Monsters.

name: Champion's Pulse
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Activate 1 of these effects;
● During your opponent's Battle Phase: They gain 1000 LP, then you end the Battle Phase.
● When your opponent activates a monster effect, if they control more cards than you do: Special Summon 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" or "Hot Red Dragon Archfiend" from your Extra Deck or GY, and if you do, negate that effect, and if you do that, destroy that monster.

name: Gagaga Illusion
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a "Gagaga" monster: Target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then you can make its Level/Rank become equal to the Level/Rank of 1 "Gagaga" monster you control.
②：If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish it; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Gagaga" monster.

name: Gagaga Escape
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：When your opponent activates a monster effect, if you control a "Gagaga" monster: Negate the activation, then you can discard 1 card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Gagaga" monster from your Deck.
②：You can banish this card from the GY; change as many "Gagaga" monsters you control as possible to Defense Position, and if you do, "Gagaga" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.

name: Endless Bond
desc:
This card is always treated as an "Xyz" card. You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：When this card resolves, you can Special Summon 1 "Number 39: Utopia" from your GY, and if you do, it gains ATK equal to the total ATK of all LIGHT "Utopia" and "Utopic" Xyz Monsters in your GY.
②：When your attacking "Utopia" or "Utopic" Xyz Monster whose original Attribute is LIGHT destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can make that monster you control lose 1000 ATK, and if you do, it can make another attack in a row.

name: Thorn Fangs of Violet Poison
desc:
This card is always treated as "Predap" card.
①：Target 1 "Starving Venom Fusion Dragon" you control; destroy as many monsters your opponent controls with lower ATK as possible, then you can discard your entire hand, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monsters' total original ATK, also the targeted monster cannot attack this turn.

name: Penetration Fusion
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：If a monster(s) was destroyed by battle this turn: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field, and if you do, it gains this effect.
● (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, then target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 500 ATK.

name: Surprise Fusion
desc:
You can only use the ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Target 1 face-up monster you control and declare 1 Type and 1 Attribute; that monster becomes the declared Type and Attribute, then you can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control, including the targeted monster.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; Tribute 1 Fusion Monster, and if you do, Special Summon 2 "Surprise Tokens" (Spellcaster/DARK/ATK 0/DEF 0) with the same Level.

name: Sky Striker Mecha – Adhilsaber
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During the Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Sky Striker" monster on the field; it gains 1500 ATK until the end of this turn.
②：If a monster(s) is Special Summoned while this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Sky Striker" Link Monster you control; equip this card to it as an Equip Spell that gives it 1500 ATK.

name: Learning Elf
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Set 1 Trap from your Deck that has effect to equip itself to a monster.
②：If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can draw 1 card.

name: Armament Reincarnation
desc: ①：Special Summon "Armament Reincarnation Tokens" (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) up to the number of Equip Spells, and Traps with an effect to equip themselves to a monster, in your GY, then you can destroy as many cards in your Spell & Trap Zone as possible, including this card, then Set as many Equip Spells, and Traps with an effect to equip themselves to a monster, as possible from your GY, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn. These Traps can be activated this turn.

name: Mirror Barrier
desc:
You can only use the ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to it as an Equip Card with this effect.
● Once per Battle Step, if the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster: You can destroy that opponent's monster.
②：If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 "Armament Reincarnation" from your Deck to your hand.

name: Dragunity Divine Wind
desc:
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During your Main Phase: You can apply 1 of these effects, or, if you have "Dragon Ravine" in your GY, you can apply both, in sequence.
● Add 1 Dragon or Winged Beast monster from your GY to your hand.
● Special Summon 1 "Dragunity" monster from your hand, then you can equip 1 Dragon "Dragunity" monster from your Deck to it.

name: Darkness Resonator
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" in your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Resonator" in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (you can only gain this effect once per turn).
③：You can target any number of Tuners you control; their Levels become 1.

name: Power Vice Dragon
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are DARK Synchro Monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Resonator" monster from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except DARK Synchro Monsters.
③：A "Red Dragon Archfiend" Summoned using this card as Synchro Material cannot be destroyed by battle.

name: Fiend Piece Golem
desc:
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a Fiend Tuner: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can decrease its Level by up to 2.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro Summon of "Red Dragon Archfiend" or a monster that mentions it: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.

name: Red Nova Dragon/Assault Mode
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Assault Mode Activate".
①：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can banish this card until the End Phase; banish cards your opponent controls up to the number of Tuners in your GY.
②：When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can banish this card until the End Phase; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.
③：If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Red Nova Dragon" from your GY.

name: The Crimson King
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner DARK monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 card that mentions "Red Dragon Archfiend" from your Deck to your hand.
②：When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Red Dragon Archfiend" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon), and if you do, its current ATK becomes doubled, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

name: Crimson Blade Dragon
desc:
1 "Resonator" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
This card is always treated as "Crimson Blader". You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add to your hand, or Special Summon (but its effects are negated), 1 Level 8 or higher monster from your Deck or GY that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
②：At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a Level 5 or higher monster: You can destroy that monster.

name: Crimson Call
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Add 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend monster from your GY to your hand, or, if you control "Red Dragon Archfiend" or a Synchro Monster that mentions it, you can add the monster from your Deck instead.
②：If your "/Assault Mode" monster or "Red Dragon Archfiend" attacks, at the end of the Damage Step: You can banish this card from your GY; that monster can make a second attack in a row.

name: The Ruler's Rumbling
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card name's per turn. Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation if your opponent Special Summoned 10 or more monsters this turn.
①：Apply these effects, in sequence, based on the number of monsters your opponent Special Summoned this turn.
● 1+: Special Summon 1 DARK Synchro Monster from your GY or banishment.
● 3+: "Red Dragon Archfiend" in your Monster Zone is unaffected by your opponent's activated effects until the end of your next turn.
● 5+: Change all monsters your opponent currently controls to face-down Defense Position.

name: Charmers of the Grand Circle
desc:
2+ "Charmer" and/or "Familiar-Possessed" monsters
You can only use the effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can choose among these effects a number of times up to the number of original Attributes among its material (max. 4) and apply them in sequence (you can choose the same effect multiple times)
● This card gains 800 ATK.
● Add 1 "Possessed" Spell/Trap from the Deck to the hand.
● Return 1 card on the field to the hand
● Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from the GY.

name: Spellbook of the Grand Circle
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effects of this card's name once per turn each.
①：Add 4 "Charmer" monsters with different Attributes from your Deck, GY and/or banishment to your hand, then return 2 cards from your hand to your Deck.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster using "Charmer" and/or "Familiar-Possessed" monsters from your hand or field. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when that monster is Fusion Summoned.

name: The Three Brave Swordsouls
desc:
1 Level 4 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or 8 Spellcaster monster whose ATK equals its DEF from your Deck or GY to your hand.
②：You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects, then, if you have an "Ecclesia" monster or "Fallen of Albaz" in your GY, you can destroy that card.

name: Saber Combination
desc:
You can can only use the ② and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①："X-Saber" monsters you control gain ATK equal to their own original DEF while you have 10 or more "X-Saber" monsters in your field, GY, and/or banishment.
②：If you Special Summon an "X-Saber" monster(s) from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon 1 "X-Saber" monster from your hand or Deck.
③：When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon 1 "X-Saber" monster from your hand.

name: Fallin’ Cheatah
desc:
①：Cannot be Tributed or used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon.
②：If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field while this monster is on the field: You can target 1 of them; switch control of it and this card, but that monster cannot be Tributed or used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon while this monster is on the field.

name: Black Jack the Shadow-Armored Knight
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
①：Cannot be destroyed by battle.
②：Each time a card(s) is placed in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone: Excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a monster and equip it to this card, also place the rest on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
③：Gains ATK/DEF equal to the total Levels of the monsters equipped to this card x 300.
④：If the total Levels of the monsters equipped to this card are more than 21, destroy it.

name: Pair Bear Scare!!
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. You can only use the ② effect of this card's name once per Duel.
①：Your opponent can reveal 1 "Pair Bear Scare!!" in their hand or Deck, and if they do, each player gains 2000 LP. Otherwise, destroy 1 monster they control.
(2): If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add this card to your opponent's hand.

name: Early Palm Gets the Win
desc:
①：Once per turn, when an attack is declared involving your monster: You can roll a six-sided die and apply this effect to your battling monster based on the result, until the end of this turn. If you activate this effect during a battle involving 2 monsters in the same column, choose which effect to apply without rolling a die.
● 1 or 4: The first time it would be destroyed by battle or card effect, it is not destroyed.
● 2 or 5: It loses 500 ATK, also it is unaffected by activated Spell/Trap effects, except "Early Palm Gets the Win".
● 3 or 6: It gains 1000 ATK, also it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase.

name: Ebisu Shinsen Matsuri
desc:
①：Once per Chain, if an Effect Monster(s) is Special Summoned: You can target 1 of them; Special Summon 1 "Shinsen Token" (Aqua/WATER/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0) to its controller's opponent's field in Defense Position.
②：At the start of the Battle Phase: You can destroy this card and as many Tokens on the field as possible, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Ebisu Token" (Fairy/WATER/Level 7/ATK ?/DEF ?). Its ATK/DEF become the number of Tokens destroyed by this effect x 700.

name: Miracle Ejector
desc:
This card is always treated as an "Elemental HERO" card. You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell/Trap that mentions an "Elemental HERO" monster's card name from your Deck to your hand.
③：If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it.

name: Infernal Strike Fighter
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：During the Main Phase 2 (Quick Effect): You can destroy as many face-up monsters on the field as possible, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monsters' total original Levels x 200.
②：If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 Level 5 or lower Machine monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position.

name: Wind Unicorn Parallel, the Dracoslayer
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 2
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use the Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If you have a card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon this card.
● Destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower Pendulum Monster Card from your Pendulum Zone.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use the ② monster effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Your opponent cannot target this Pendulum Summoned card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by their card effects.
②：(Quick Effect): You can target 1 Pendulum Monster Card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; return them to the hand.

name: Galaxy-Eyes Antimatter Dragon
desc:
2 Level 9 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Galaxy-Eyes Antimatter Dragon" by using an Xyz Monster you control with 3 or more materials (transfer its material).
①：Any battle damage this card with material inflicts to your opponent is halved.
②：You can detach 1 material from this card; apply this effect, then, if you detached a monster, you can send 1 monster with its same Type from your Deck to the GY. Once applied, this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase this turn.

name: Crystron Halqifibrax Prism
desc:
2+ monsters, including a Tuner
You can only use the ① and ② effects of this card's name once per turn each.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Tuner from your Extra Deck in Defense Position, with a Level lower than or equal to the total original Levels of the monsters used as material.
②：During your opponent's Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card you control; Special Summon 3 "Crystron Tokens" (Machine/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). They cannot be Tributed.

name: Tohushaddoll Grysta
desc:
You can use only 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name, and only once that turn.
①：FLIP: You can target 1 non-Rock "Shaddoll" monster in your GY; apply its effect that activates when it is flipped face-up.
②：If this card is sent to the GY by card effect: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Shaddoll" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing its material from your hand, field, and/or GY. You cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck the turn you activate this effect, except "Shaddoll" monsters.

name: El Shaddoll Meshahrail
desc:
1 "Shaddoll" monster + 1 DARK monster + 1 EARTH monster
Must be Fusion Summoned.
①：Unaffected by your opponent's activated Spell/Trap effects and by activated effects from opponent's monsters whose original Level/Rank is lower than this card's current Level.
②：Once per turn: You can pay 800 LP; add 1 "Shaddoll" card or "Void" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
③：If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Shaddoll" monster from your GY.

name: Void Liberation
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Reveal 1 "Shaddoll" card in your hand; add 2 "Shaddoll" cards from your Deck to your hand of different types (Monster, Spell, Trap) from the revealed card and each other, then discard 1 card.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Infernoid" monster from your Deck or GY your hand.

name: Stellarnova Bonds
desc:
You can only activate a card with this card's name once per turn.
①：Activate one of the following effects, but you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of the turn, except Xyz Monsters.
● Discard 1 card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Tellarknight" or "Constellar" monster from your Deck with a different Type than the monsters you control.
● Target face-up monsters on your opponent's field up to the number of "Tellarknight" or "Constellar" monsters you control; negate those monsters' effects until the end of the turn.

name: Reeshaddoll Wendiculhu
desc:
1 "Shaddoll" monster + 1 WIND monster
Must first be Fusion Summoned. You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：(Quick Effect): You can change any number of Set monsters to face-up Defense Position, then you can change other face-up monsters on the field to face-down Defense Position up to the number of Flip monsters flipped face-up.
②：If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Shaddoll" card in your GY; add it to your hand.

name: End of the World Ruler
desc:
You can Ritual Summon this card with any "End of the World" card. You can only use the ② and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：This card's name becomes "Demise, King of Armageddon" while in the hand or field.
②：You can reveal this card in your hand, pay 2000 LP, and banish 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck; apply that card's activation effect that Ritual Summons a monster.
③：You can pay 2000 LP; destroy as many other cards on the field as possible, then this card gains 2900 ATK.

name: Nightmare-Eyes Restrict
desc:
2 monsters with different Types (Fiend, Illusion, Spellcaster)
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned, OR, if this card battles, at the end of the Battle Phase: You can equip 1 monster your opponent controls to it.
②：Gains ATK equal to those equipped monsters' total ATK.
③：If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle.
④：Your opponent's monsters cannot attack monsters, except this one.

name: Dragunity Quirinus
desc:
You can only use the ① and ③ effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Dragunity" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
②：Your "Dragunity" monsters cannot be destroyed by battle while this card is equipped with an Equip Card.
③：You can target 1 other "Dragunity" Monster Card you control; return it to the hand/Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 "Dragunity" monster from your hand.

name: Dragunity Falchion
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can banish this card from your hand or GY, then target 1 "Dragunity" monster you control; equip 1 Dragon "Dragunity" monster from your Deck or GY to it.
②：You can send this card equipped to a "Dragunity" monster to the GY, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; banish it.

name: Dragunity Knight – Areus
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can target face-up cards your opponent controls up to the number of face-up Monster Cards in your Spell & Trap Zone; negate their effects until the end of this turn. This is a Quick Effect if this card is equipped with an Equip Card.
②：While this card is equipped to a monster: You can Special Summon it, then you can Special Summon 1 "Dragunity" Tuner from your GY.

name: Dragunity Lord – Georgius
desc:
2+ monsters, including a Tuner
You can only use the ① and ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned, or your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Dragunity" monster from your Extra Deck or GY.
②：Your opponent cannot activate monster effects in the GY while this card is equipped with a "Dragunity" card.
③：When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Card you control to the GY; negate that effect.

name: X-Saber Perina
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send it to the GY; Special Summon 2 "X-Saber" monsters from your Deck, except "X-Saber Perina", but destroy them during the End Phase.
②：If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro Summon of an "X-Saber" monster: You can apply 1 of these effects.
● It can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
● It can attack directly.

name: X-Saber Bruno
desc:
You can only use the ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is in your hand: You can banish 1 other EARTH monster from your hand, face-up field, or GY; Special Summon this card.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Saber" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand.
③：Once per turn, during your opponent's Main or Battle Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using only EARTH monsters you control, including this card.

name: Commander Souza, Swordmaster
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ EARTH monsters
This card is always treated as an "X-Saber" card.
①：Gains 200 ATK for each banished monster.
②：When this card destroys a monster by battle: You can draw 1 card.
③：Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "X-Saber" monster; destroy 1 card they control.
④：If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 "Saber" card from your GY instead.

name: X-Saber Gottoms
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ EARTH monsters
You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Saber" or "Gottoms" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
②：When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can discard 1 random card from their hand.
③：When your "X-Saber" monster is targeted for an attack while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, then change the attack target to it.

name: Constellar Castor
desc:
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Constellar" monster from your Deck, except "Constellar Castor", also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except LIGHT and DARK monsters.
②：A "Constellar" Xyz Monster that has this card as material gains this effect.
● Once per turn, when your opponent activates a Spell Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 Xyz Materials from your monsters, and if you do, negate that effect, and if you do that, destroy that card.

name: Tellarknight Cygnian
desc:
This card is always treated as a "Constellar" card. You can only use the ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Tellarknight" or "Constellar" monster from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can target 1 other LIGHT monster you control; increase its Level and this card's by 1.
③：This card can be treated as 2 materials for the Xyz Summon of a "Tellarknight" Xyz Monster that requires 3 or more materials.

name: Exstellarknight Constellar Ptolemy Ω7
desc:
3 Level 7 monsters
Once per turn, during your Main Phase 2, you can also Xyz Summon "Exstellarknight Constellar Ptolemy Ω7" by using a "Tellarknight" or "Constellar" Xyz Monster you control (transfer its materials).
①：While you have 7 or more "Tellarknight" monsters with different names in your GY and/or banishment, this card gains 2700 ATK/DEF, also it is unaffected by your opponent's activated card effects.
②：Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many monsters your opponent controls; shuffle them into the Deck.

name: Tellarknight Constellar Delteros
desc:
3+ Level 4 monsters
①：Your opponent cannot target Rank 5 or higher "Tellarknight" and "Constellar" Xyz Monsters you control with card effects.
②：Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Tellarknight" or "Constellar" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 LIGHT monster.
③：If this card is sent to the GY, except from the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Tellarknight" or "Constellar" monster from your hand or banishment.

name: Magical Musket Mastermind Caspar
desc:
2 monsters, including a LIGHT Fiend monster
You can only use the ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can take 2 "Magical Musket" cards from your hand and/or Deck, including a monster, Special Summon 1 of those monsters, and Set the other card to your opponent's field.
②：During either player's turn, you can activate "Magical Musket" Spell/Trap Cards from your hand.
